titleStmt.title: News from the coffe-house; in which is shewn their several sorts of passions, containing newes from all our neighbour nations. A poem.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Crowch for Thomas Vere at the Cock in St. John's-street,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You that delight in wit and mirth ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
